class.name: wxWrapSizer
class.description:
A wrap sizer lays out its items in a single line, like a box sizer -- as long as there is space available in that direction.

Once all available space in the primary direction has been used, a new line is added and items are added there.

So a wrap sizer has a primary orientation for adding items, and adds lines as needed in the secondary direction.

flag.name: wxWRAPSIZER_DEFAULT_FLAGS
flag.description: Equivalent to a combination of wxEXTEND_LAST_ON_EACH_LINE and wxREMOVE_LEADING_SPACES.

flag.name: wxEXTEND_LAST_ON_EACH_LINE
flag.description: Will cause the last item on each line to use any remaining space on that line.

flag.name: wxREMOVE_LEADING_SPACES
flag.description: Removes any spacer elements from the beginning of a row.
